<sim>.name: Sim
<sim>.info: She is a veteran actress known for her charismatic presence and deep emotional expression. Her warm smile contrasts with her strong, commanding roles on screen.

<sky>.name: Sky
<sky>.info: A charming actor with a youthful vibe, he balances playful charisma with subtle emotional depth. His expressive gestures add charm to every public appearance.

<suhwan>.name: Suhwan
<suhwan>.info: He often brings levity to the screen with his comedic timing and approachable personality. His signature glasses and sincere demeanor make him a memorable presence.

<sunghoon>.name: Sunghoon
<sunghoon>.info: With a soft yet structured look, he carries a calm elegance suited for both romantic and introspective roles. His poised posture conveys confidence and sensitivity.
